com.inet.editor
Class HyperlinkInputDialog

java.lang.Object
  com.inet.editor.HyperlinkInputDialog

public class HyperlinkInputDialog
extends java.lang.Object

Displays a dialog to add, edit or remove the hyperlink property from a text part.
